For your stay during the Scalar Conference, we recommend the following hotels, with a special discount for our participants:

Radisson Blu Centrum

Very close to the venue of the conference, planty of luxury in a very good price.

Price: 312.12 PLN / single room & 376.92 PLN / double room (8% VAT, breakfast and Internet included)

Address: ul. Grzybowska 24

Email: reservations.warsaw@radissonblu.com

Promo Code: scalar 2016

IBIS Stare Miasto

Located very close to the Old Town.

Price: 165 PLN / single room & 185 PLN / double room (8% VAT, breakfast and Internet included)

Address: ul. Muranowska 2

Email: H3714@accor.com

Promo Code: scalar 2016

IBIS Warszawa Centrum

Very good location, close to the conference venue as well as places worth seeing in Warsaw.

Price: 165 PLN / single room & 185 PLN / double room (8% VAT, breakfast and Internet included)

Address: al. Solidarnosci 165

Email: H2894@accor.com

Promo Code: scalar 2016
